description:
Fwupd 2.0 Linux firmware updater is now available for download with support for new devices, numerous new features and improvements, and a bunch of bug fixes. Here's what's new!

The post Fwupd 2.0 Open-Source Linux Firmware Updater Released with Major Changes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fwupd 2.0 Open-Source Linux Firmware Updater Released with Major Changes

description:
Ardour 8.8 open-source digital audio workstation is now available for download with various bug fixes and improvements. Here's what's changed!

title: Ardour 8.8 Open-Source DAW Released with Various Bug Fixes and Improvements
